Isabella Rodriguez.description: opening Hobbs Cafe, 3) work at the cafe counter at 9:00 am, 4) serve customers at the cafe at 10:00 am, 5) take a short break at 11:00 am, 6) prepare lunch for herself and her employees at 12:00 pm, 7) have lunch at 1:00 pm, 8) work on party preparations for Valentine's Day at 2:00 pm, 9) decorate the cafe for the party at 3:00 pm, 10) finalize party details at 4:00 pm, 11) get ready to host the Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe at 5:00 pm, 12) interact with customers at the party at 6:00 pm, 13) enjoy the party with her customers at 7:00 pm, 14) close Hobbs Cafe at 8:00 pm, 15) clean up the cafe at 9:00 pm, 16) prepare for bed at 10:00 pm, 17) go to sleep at 11:00 pm. Isabella Rodriguez's day is filled with work, preparations for the Valentine's Day party, and interacting with customers to make sure they have a great experience at Hobbs Cafe (turning on the lights and appliances in the kitchen and cafe area) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:refrigerator
